title: Clube Restauração
body: It was founded in May 1879 at the former Clube União, on Avenida “Manuel de Arriaga”, the former Praça da Constituição. Its statutes were approved by decree of the Civil Governor on August 12, 1889, and reformed by the general assembly on February 21, 1897.

Funchal: Location where the Clube Restauração was founded

1889: Approval of the statutes of Clube Restauração
1897: Reformation of the statutes of Clube Restauração
